body.name: winees Outdoor Security Camera, Wired 2K 4MP Indoor/Outdoor Video Camera for Home Security, Surveillance Camera with Color Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Siren, Human/Pet/Sound Detection
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 15 mins
features: 🌟【 Capture Every Detail in 2K-4MP 】🌟 Experience unparalleled clarity with Winees security camera outdoor. 2K-4MP resolution and F1.6 aperture combine for vivid images, delivering 24/7 live streaming in remarkable clarity.

🌙 【Full-Color Night Vision, Even in Low Light 】🌙 Enjoy advanced color night vision with a 4CCT spotlight and starlight sensor. Monitor in vivid color, even in dimly lit conditions, for unmatched visibility day and night.

🔍【 Stay Informed with Smart AI Detection 】🔍 This surveillance camera will alert you in real time to people, pets, and unusual movement or sound. Customize detection zones and sensitivity for a tailored security solution.

🏡 【Seamless Use Anywhere, Anytime 】🏡 Security camera mounts easily with just one screw, adjust monitoring area freely post-installation. With weather resistance, monitor confidently in rain, sun, or snow. Flexible camera angle ensures versatile views.

🔒 【Secure Storage and Privacy at the Core】 🔒 Choose from microSD card storage (up to 128 GB) or encrypted cloud storage. Rest assured with absolute privacy protection. Set full-time or event recording. Winees captures every cherished moment.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Experience clarity with 2K-4MP resolution, vivid color night vision, smart AI alerts, weatherproof design, and secure storage from Winees outdoor cameras.

Safety Warning It can turn on the light, alarm when receiving an event notification; talk to warn off intruders. Next page 1 Color Night Vision 2 Crystal Clear 2K QHD 3 4CCT Mixed Spotlight 4 Safety Warning

Smart AI Recognition Advanced detections for human, *pet, *vehicle, *package, *animal. Automatically categorize notifications to reduce false positives. Animal Detection Monitor dangers in time. When bears, wolves, and other giant animals invade your home, be notified.

Next page 1 Glass Break Detection 2 CO/Smoke Detection 3 Crsip Two Way Talk

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera, loud alarm, nice night vision.
reviews.reviewText: I love this camera. I’ve had it for quite some time now and it does a great job, I have it outside in my garage watching my dogs and the video quality is so clear, it has a very loud alarm and very nice night vision ,I always recommend this camera for new homeowners that do not want to spend hundreds on a security camera. Hundred percent recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive and Reliable
reviews.reviewText: This camera has been amazing, setup is extremely easy and applying your preferences and settings is a breeze. This camera has been reliable as well, I can monitor package deliveries as well as ensure my house is safe. I haven’t had an issue at all with this camera, very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sent used item with missing parts ;UPDATE 5 stars
reviews.reviewText: Sent me a used device. The package was already open and was missing items. I paid for brand new device not a used product. Missing screw and charger plug.THE CUSTOMER IS GREAT, they replaced it with brand new camera at no cost. The is fantastic with tons of features, camera quality , picture quality is excellent. Motion , AI, flood light , fire sensor , and so much more. I am still experiencing it and enjoying is so far , if any things changes I will update. Great price great features and Best customer service. All team ESPECIALLY SILVIYA. THANKS GUYS

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Winees Outdoor Security Camera
reviews.reviewText: This camera is really great in the day and not too bad in the night. Only thing I am having issues with is it does not pick up all activity via cloud. You can get continuous recording on the SD card. You have Events which is the cloud then you have the SD card which I have it at 1 minute and 1 minute cool down. Cool down is the break in between recording. The break in between the cloud don’t pick it up. I have a few days to decide if I’m going do the subscription. So, the subscription going give you storage for 30 days. That’s the difference I think all these camera sales should specify more about the subscription as well as the hype of the camera. The price option for subscribers( if you’re interested in getting) is about $1.99 monthly and or $20 for the year. Not bad. The customer service is great. They get back with you asap. Not the same day but the next day. So keep that in mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect economical smart
reviews.reviewText: Recently bought 2 m3 plus cams works great specially in this price .this is an amazing item i have inserted sd cards and now getting non stop recordings AI works for event recordings, auto cloud saved option is great as well.

reviews.reviewerName: I waited a month for this coat. And I ordered it a size bigger and it is as to small and not a coat a summer jacket.  I was very disappointed. I will never order anything to wear again.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used it to catch a thief. The camera is great. The flash is what makes it hard to catch the criminal. That's the only thing I dislike about the camera. The pictures are good. And they have the time and date of every event. It's a good product except for the bright flash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this camera!
reviews.reviewText: This camera has excellent resolution during the daylight hours.It has good night mode in color, it’s just grittier. There definitely needs to be some improvement for dark hours.The sound is great and is clear. If you have spotty WiFi, you could lose sound like what happens to me.Otherwise, I don’t really have to reboot the device itself, just my internet.I’ve used most of the features and they’re great. I haven’t had to use the two-way talk because I put these on a window indoors. I tested it though and it’s pretty good.I’m satisfied with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Laggy, kinda disappointing
reviews.reviewText: It's meh. Better inside the house. The night vision is decent. I'm having issues receiving notifications from the app aidot -_-

Der Artikel kam gut verpackt bei mir an.Die Verarbeitungsqualität ist gemessen am preis sehr gut.Das Preis / Leistungsverhältnis würde ich mit gut bis sehr gut bewerten.Alles in allem erfüllt der Artikel seinen zweck und es gibt nichts zu beanstanden.

Avec des vues à 360° (panoramique à 270°), la caméra de sécurité extérieure Winees peut couvrir plus de portée dont vous avez besoin pour regarder et réduire les angles morts. La caméra extérieure avec des méthodes d'installation positives et négatives est équipée d'un 7 -mètre de câble, ce qui est plus pratique à installer et à utiliser.Il est important de noter que cette caméra ne fonctionne qu'en Wi-Fi 2,4 GHz et qu'elle est gérée via une application téléchargeable sur votre téléphone. Elle ne dispose pas de batterie, comme je disais, le câble est très long, mais bien entendu, il faudra prévoir une prise à proximité et a l'abris, c'est pour cela que personnellement, je préfère les modèles sur batterie ou avec panneau solaire.

reviews.reviewTitle: Dal design minimal, dalle prestazioni eccellenti e dal prezzo contenuto.
reviews.reviewText: PREMESSA > come ben rappresenta le immagini della pagina prodotto, diversi sono gli utilizzi a cui può essere destinato questo accessorio. Il marchio winees è specializzato nella realizzazione di telecamera per la sorveglianza interna ed esterna, dando un occhio allo store ho notato che vende solo accessori di questo tipo. Buon segno per chi vuole garantirsi l’arrivo a casa di un prodotto funzionante e di qualità.COM’E’ > All’interno della confezione è presente la telecamera, della minuteria per fissarla, un manuale per l’installazione e un cavo per collegarla alla corrente compreso di caricatore da presa con un cavo di alimentazione molto lungo. La telecamera WIFI funziona con la registrazione video 1080P a 30 fps (fino ad arrivare a 2k che garantisce una qualità maggiore avendo una telecamera da 4 mp), ed ha un obiettivo grandangolo da 270° che ruota comprendo l’intera superfice circostante. Oltre l’obiettivo di ripresa la telecamera offre anche la presenza di un faretto da ben 400 lumen che può essere attivato durante le rilevazioni notturne (contrariamente si lasciano attivi solo gli infrarossi). Questa telecamera può essere utilizzata con WIFI a 2,4 GHz, che consente di utilizzarla in wireless, ma non può essere collegata alla linea 5 GHz. Questo non crea grosse difficoltà, anche perché il collegamento all’applicazione è rapido ed automatico.COME VA > per il momento ho deciso di non fissarla al muro, anche perché devo ancora stabilire con precisione dove posizionarla. Devo dire che l’angolo è ottimo e per di più può essere direzionata dove si preferisce attraverso l’applicazione. Ottima la possibilità di inserire una micro-SD da 256 gb, in questo modo la telecamera nascosta salverà tutto quello registrato sino ad esaurirsi della memoria, per ritornare a scrivere successivamente. Finalmente recensisco un prodotto che offre un storage superiore ai classici 128 gb che ritengo riduttivi per conservare le riprese salienti. Peccato non presenta una batteria che possa tenerla in vita in caso di sabotaggio. Il design è molto carino e minimal, sicuramente si distingue da tutte quelle presenti su amazon.

reviews.reviewTitle: Tiene un sistema de anclaje a paredes y techos muy fácil y resistente. Con gran calidad de video.
reviews.reviewText: Me parece una buena cámara de video vigilancia ya que tiene una muy buena calidad de imagen. Es muy compacta y resistente a la intemperie ya que es para instalar en exteriores. Tiene seguimiento de personas y vehículos, resolución 2K, audio bidireccional, una luz led muy potente a modo de deslumbre y visión nocturna entre otras funciones interesantes.Funciona a través de conexión WIFI con una aplicación que debemos instalar en nuestro smartphone para que nos lleguen las notificaciones de detección de movimiento y podamos controlar muchas funciones y rutinas de la propia cámara. La aplicación que se debe utilizar es AiDot y esta disponible en iOs y Android.La cámara necesita alimentación con su cable incluido y que no se puede quitar, quizás esta sea la única parte negativa que le encuentro a esta cámara de video vigilancia ya que es posible que alguna vez perdamos conexión WIFI por culpa de nuestro router y eso haría que la cámara no haga su función. Personalmente me gustaría que funcione a través de cable Ethernet y se pueda alimentar con sistema POE pero esta cámara no lo hace. De todas formas la cámara tiene un slot para tarjetas Micro SD de hasta 128Gb para realizar grabaciones.Se puede instalar tanto en paredes como en techos y trae consigo 2 tornillos y 2 tacos de nylon en una bolsita por lo que no necesitamos comprar nada para hacer la instalación. La instalación es muy sencilla levantando una tapita de plástico colocada con un tornillo y atornillando esa tapa en nuestro techo o pared. También trae un pequeño alfiler para que podamos resetear la cámara en caso que se haya bloqueado y también su transformador de corriente de 12V. Este transformador tiene un conector especial que funciona a media rosca para que no sea fácil quitarlo de un tirón y ademas no entre agua en el caso de colocarlo en la calle.Es resumen tiene funciones muy importantes para la video vigilancia como visión nocturna infrarroja, visión de 360 grados con un rotor automático que podemos mover con nuestro smartphone, una luz led de 400 lúmenes, un sensor de movimiento PIR físico (no a través de software), audio bidireccional y gran calidad de imagen de hasta 2K.El fabricante nos proporciona servicio en la nube de forma gratuita aunque solo durante 30 días. Es compatible con Alexa.Es una buena cámara de video vigilancia para exteriores aunque solo puede funcionar por WIFI y su APP AiDot.

Cette caméra de vidéo surveillance est bonne dans l'ensemble. Elle dispose de plein de fonctionnalités intéressantes.La qualité vidéo est bonne et on arrive assez bien distinguer ce qui se passe.Je n'aime pas la note maximale car je trouve que le prix est un peu élevé. Je ne la trouve par exemple pas super en basse luminosité.
